title: ICE: 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: !substs.has_regions_escaping_depth(0)'

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
Code:

```
use std::marker::PhantomData;

fn f<'a>(PhantomData::<&'a u8>: PhantomData<&'a u8>) {}

fn main() {}
```

ICEs on stable/beta/nightly.
